sentences.en: A sprightly racer that makes an impact with both its performance and its look.
sentences.cn: 阿明快,使赛车的影响,其性能和外观.

sentences.en: As a sprightly comedy this show fills the bill.
sentences.cn: 作为轻喜剧,这样演是适宜的.

sentences.en: But the industry seems to be coming to terms with the fact that it is no longer as young and sprightly as it once was.
sentences.cn: 不过这个产业似乎已经认识到，事实上他们已经不再像曾经有过的那样年轻活泼了。

sentences.en: He's surprisingly sprightly for an old man.
sentences.cn: 他这把年纪了,还这麽精神,真了不起.

sentences.en: Is your once sprightly PC now grinding slowly along?
sentences.cn: 是您的电脑一旦明快现在磨削缓慢沿?

sentences.en: Judith is a sprightly young woman.
sentences.cn: 朱迪思是个机灵的姑娘.

sentences.en: Other spot's repair adopts the sprightly means succinctly the material standard spoken Chinese the work simplification.
sentences.cn: 其他部位的装修采取简洁、明快的办法,材料普通话,做工简单化.

sentences.en: Qinghua wares are refined, natural, sprightly, have a strong decoration.
sentences.cn: 青花的特点是明快 、 新、致、方, 装饰性强, 素为国内外人士所珍爱;并且在世界的制造瓷器的工艺中有着极为重要的地位.

sentences.en: She is a sprightly married woman, hemmed in By an overwhelming sense of duty.
sentences.cn: 她是个活泼的已婚妇女, 但却为一种强烈的责任感所约束.

sentences.en: She is as sprightly as a woman half her age .
sentences.cn: 她跟比她年轻一半的妇女一样活泼。

sentences.en: She was as sprightly as a woman half her age.
sentences.cn: 她跟比她年轻一半的妇女一样活泼.

sentences.en: She was too sprightly to allow of their walking at a slow pace on her account.
sentences.cn: 她很利索地跟着他们走,以免他们为了她的缘故而要放慢脚步.

sentences.en: The patient smiled when he heard the sprightly music on the radio.
sentences.cn: 听到收音机里传来的轻快乐曲,这个病人笑了.

sentences.en: Then he was so sprightly, so clean.
sentences.cn: 那时候,他是那么生气勃勃 、 衣冠整洁.

sentences.en: They are like streetcars running contentedly on their rails and they despise the sprightly flivver that dashes in and out of the traffic and speeds so jauntily across the open country.
sentences.cn: 他们就像是有轨电车，满足于现行的轨迹，同时，对那些在车流中穿梭的，在田野间轻快飞驰的廉价小汽车嗤之以鼻。

sentences.en: Though it's an ancient art form, the aphorism is as sprightly and as apposite as ever.
sentences.cn: 尽管谚语是一种很古老的艺术形式, 但它依然是最为简洁贴切的表达法.

sentences.en: Tossing their heads in sprightly dance.

trans.tran_en: an old person who is sprightly is still active and full of energy – used to show approval
